item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Parkside on South Main Street in Providence (near the courthouse and across from Heminways).

This is a smaller restaurant with good food and a cozy atmosphere. It also has cute little window seats that look fun to sit in and watch people walk by. Its the perfect place for an early spring and potentially rainy evening.

It should be fairly easy to find parking along South Water St. Parkside is on the next block after the Cable Car movie theater.

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a gray and black scarf, but we're not hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Parkside!
